property-title: Adsorption energy from a static calculation
property-description: Adsorption energy from a calculation of a static configuration which uses non-atomic systems to compute reference energies. Energies must be specified to be per-atom if true. If the reference energies are known, this must be specified as well.

energy.description: The adsorption energy of the system.

per-atom.description: If True, "energy" is the adsorption energy of the system divided by the number of atoms in the configuration.

reference-energy.description: If known, represents values which have been subtracted from the base energy, resulting in the adsorption energy.
